extendedInfo.description: CHECK OUT THE NEW SHH! SECRET SANTA PRO 2011!https://market.android.com/details?id=com.firstandgoalsoftware.ShhSecretSanta.appWith Shh! Secret Santa Pro you can add exclusions (to prevent drawing your spouse or the person you got last year for instance), add manual participants (for your young cousins who don't have cell phones or email addresses. They can view their draw instantly on your phone), and customize the invitation message! Also, no ads, a customizable invitation message, and unlimited parties! Download the PRO version today! https://market.android.com/details?id=com.firstandgoalsoftware.ShhSecretSanta.appForget having to arrange to meet in person to draw names from a hat.  Now you can organize your Secret Santa or any gift swap right from your Android phone with Shh! Secret Santa!  - Select participants from your contacts- Randomly assign Santas- Notify participants via text message or email!  - Multiple parties, unlimited participants!

reviews.title: SMSs didn\'t send
reviews.comment: Nice concept, but SMSs didn\'t send. Not the only secret Santa app not to, however, so don\'t know if it\'s a phone or network compatibility problem.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thanks
reviews.comment: Better than others as can send out texts easily and brilliant for those who are living away now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Missing name
reviews.comment: I set up the draw for 9 people.  Half of the people recieved only part of the text message & was missing the name they were supposed to get.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Two years running!!
reviews.comment: Worked great last year.  Upgrading to pro for the exclusions!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rubbish!
reviews.comment: How can it be a Secret Santa app if you can only have one participant!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its working after reinstall
reviews.comment: Wish there were a way to send messages and not let everyone know who is in the drawing (email).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Downloaded update now it just comes up with force close :( htc desire
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty nice.
reviews.comment: The app seems great so far. It would be nice to be able to resend draws individually instead of whole group.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why do I have to use contacts?
reviews.comment: I wish I could make a list of my kids, for example, or cousins who don\'t have emails so they are not listed in my contacts...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple, fast, 100% effective! Great for long distance secret santas!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app! Just needs a way to prevent spouses from drawing each other, then it will get 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User
